thread.title: One dead, one seriously injured after crash in Awakino, Waitomo District
thread.title_full: One dead, one seriously injured after crash in Awakino, Waitomo District

title: One dead, one seriously injured after crash in Awakino, Waitomo District
text:
One dead, one seriously injured after crash in Awakino, Waitomo District Last updated 15:09, February 19 2017 SIMON MAUDE / FAIRFAX NZ 
Police are attending a serious crash in the Waitomo District. 
Traffic is backing up on State Highway 3 in the Waitomo District after a crash that killed one person and seriously injured another. 
A St John spokeswoman said one person was taken by ambulance to Taranki Base Hospital in a serious condition. One died at the scene. 
Emergency services were called to the scene approximately 5km north of the Awakino Tunnel at 1:15pm on Sunday. 
NZTA said the road is closed and could remain so for four hours. State Highway 4 is suggested as an alternative. 
Motorists are asked to avoid the area or to delay travel wherever possible. 
The Serious Crash Unit is investigating. 
(The crash is 5km north of the green tag. Source: GOOGLE MAP)
